module Solr.UntypedQuery where

import Data.Text (Text)

data UExpr
  = UNum Float
  | UBool Bool
  | UWord Text
  | UWild Text
  | URegex Text
  | UPhrase [UExpr]
  | UFuzzed UExpr Int
  | UTo (Boundary UExpr) (Boundary UExpr)
  | UBoosted UExpr Float

data UQuery
  = UDefaultField UExpr
  | UField Text UExpr
  | UAnd UQuery UQuery
  | UOr UQuery UQuery
  | UNot UQuery UQuery
  | UScore UQuery Float
  | UNeg UQuery
  | UParams [(Text, Text)] UQuery

data Boundary a
  = Inclusive a
  | Exclusive a
  | Star
